Allows to enable a special log for all communication between iPhone and otrs. iPhone Core::Log
No
Yes
Defines the path and file name for the degug log file. This file will be automatically created by the system, if it doesn't exist. iPhone Core::Log
/tmp/iPhone.log
Sets the ticket type in the new phone ticket screen on the iPhone interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewPhone
No
Yes

Required permissions to use the ticket note screen in the iPhone interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewNote
note

Yes

Required permissions to use the ticket compose screen in the iPhone interface. iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
compose
Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket compose screen of the iPhone interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner). iPhone Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewCompose
No
Yes

No
Yes

open

pending auto
